docs.text: Pinyin dissected This page is not ordered alphabetically. It is updated progressively as I record the shadow practice series. When I see a new Pinyin that is not here, I will add it at the bottom. I think the best way to utilize this page is to leverage the search function in the broswer. Press Contrl-F, then put in the Pinyin you want to learn, if there is a hit, then shadow it!! ni 声母 Initial: n, ne rd Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: i, n ee d Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: nì, ne at Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: nī ní nǐ nì Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , yao 声母 Initial: y, n ee d Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: ao, ou r Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: yao, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: yāo yáo yǎo yào Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , neng 声母 Initial: n, ne rd Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: eng, ___(like a bee) Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: neng, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: nēng néng něng nèng Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , jin 声母 Initial: j, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: in, en glish Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: jin, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: jīn jín jǐn jìn Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , de 声母 Initial: d, learn ed Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: e, a bout Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: de, learn ed Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: dē dé dě dè Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , qu 声母 Initial: q, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: ü, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: qu, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags !!(When ü follows j/q/x, it is written as u, but still pronounced as ü. When the naughty j/q/x sees the fish eyes (two dots above u), it takes out the eyes. ) 声调 Tone: qū qú qǔ qù Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , chu 声母 Initial: ch, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: u, b oo k Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: chu, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: chū chú chǔ chù Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , lai 声母 Initial: l, l ucky Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: ai, I Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: lài, li ke Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: lāi lái lǎi lài Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 ,

docs.text: Light Chinese 4 谁敢进去 Who dares get in 我敢进去 I’ll go 你敢去 Dare you Author Roden Luo 罗登 Time 2020-05-29 06:55:02 Shadow Practice Journey to the West Pronouncing shuí gǎn jìn qù 谁敢进去？ wǒ gǎn jìn qù 我敢进去。 nǐ gǎn qù 你敢去？ Meaning 谁 who 敢 dare 我 I, me 谁敢进去？ Who dares get in? 我敢进去。 I’ll go. 你敢去？ Dare you? Shadowing Writing References Video: youtu.be/K3KNpyKILHM YouTube looper: www.infinitelooper.com Writing: www.hanzi5.com

docs.text: Light Chinese 5 你要能进得去出得来 If you can get in and come out Author Roden Luo 罗登 Time 2020-06-02 19:53:50 Shadow Practice Journey to the West Pronouncing nǐ yào néng 你 要 能 jìn dé qù 进 得 去 chū dé lái 出 得 来 Meaning 你要能 If you can 进得去 get in 出得来 come out Shadowing Typing ni yao neng jin de qu chu de lai 你要能进得去出得来 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "你要能进得去出得来") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Choose a Chinese input method you like. I’m using Sogou Pinyin ( Wiki , official link ). Writing References Video: youtu.be/K3KNpyKILHM YouTube looper: www.infinitelooper.com Writing: www.hanzi5.com var links = document.links; for (var i = 0, linksLength = links.length; i < linksLength; i++) { if (links[i].href.indexOf("pinyin") > -1) { links[i].target = '_blank'; } } // var imgs = document.images; // for (var i = 0, imgsLength = imgs.length; i < imgsLength; i++) { // if (imgs[i].src.indexOf("hanzi5") > -1) { // imgs[i].width = 150; // imgs[i].height = 150; // } // }

docs.text: Kung Fu Panda | Today is a Gift | Mandarin Chinese | 功夫熊猫 | 今天是天赐的礼物 | 普通话 Part 1 - Learn 36 words in HSK 1 Author Roden Luo 罗登 Time 2020-06-11 21:52:10 Shadow Practice Kung Fu Panda Pronouncing Chinese Pinyin English 不 bù no 吃 chī eat 大 dà big 的 de 东西 dōng xi thing 都 dōu all 个 gè a, an 好 hǎo good 回 huí return 家 jiā home 今天 jīn tiān today 看 kàn look 来 lái come 了 le 里 lǐ inside 没 méi no 明天 míng tiān tomorrow 那 (那儿) nà (nà ér) there, that 呢 ne 能 néng can, be able to 你 nǐ you 上 shàng up 什么 shén me what, why 是 shì be (am, is, are) 他 tā he, him 太 tài too 他们 tā men they 我 wǒ I, me 五 wǔ five 些 xiē some 有 yǒu have 在 zài in, at 怎么 zěn me how 这 (这儿) zhè (zhè ér) here, this 做 zuò do 昨天 zuó tiān yesterday Meaning 1 kàn lái nǐ yǐ jīng fā xiàn le zhè kē tiān zhì shén míng shèng táo shù 看来你已经发现了这棵天智神明圣桃树 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing1"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "看来你已经发现了这棵天智神明圣桃树") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I see you have found the Sacred Peach Tree of Heavenly Wisdom. 2 jiù shì zhè kē shù ? bú hǎo yì sī wǒ hái yǐ wéi shì píng cháng de táo shù 就是这棵树? 不好意思 我还以为是平常的桃树 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing2"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "就是这棵树? 不好意思 我还以为是平常的桃树") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Is that what this is? Sorry. I thought it was just a regular peach tree. 3 zhè wǒ lǐ jiě nǐ xīn qíng fán zào suǒ yǐ nǐ jiù chī 这我理解 你心情烦躁 所以你就吃 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing3"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "这我理解 你心情烦躁 所以你就吃") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I understand. You eat when you are upset. 4 xīn fán ？wǒ méi xīn fán nǐ zěn me jiào dé wǒ xīn fán ？ 心烦？我没心烦 你怎么觉得我心烦？ var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing4"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "心烦？我没心烦 你怎么觉得我心烦？") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Upset? I’m not upset. What makes you think I’m upset. 5 nǐ dào dǐ xīn lǐ zài fán xiē shí me ？ 你到底心里在烦些什么？ var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing5"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "你到底心里在烦些什么？") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } So why are you so upset? 6 āi wǒ jīn tiān de biǎo xiàn yǒu kě néng shì lì shǐ shàng zuì làn gōng fū shǐ shàng zuì làn 哎 我今天的表现有可能是历史上最烂 功夫史上最烂 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing6"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "哎 我今天的表现有可能是历史上最烂 功夫史上最烂") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I probably sucked more today than anyone in the history of kung fu. 7 zuì làn shǐ shàng zuì làn 最烂史上最烂 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing7"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "最烂史上最烂") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } In the history of China. In the history of sucking! 8 yǒu kě néng 有可能 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing8"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "有可能") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Probably. 9 hái yǒu nà wǔ gè nǐ zhēn gāi kàn kàn tā men nà yàng tā men hèn sǐ wǒ le 还有那五个 你真该看看他们那样 他们恨死我了 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing9"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "还有那五个 你真该看看他们那样 他们恨死我了") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } And the Five! Man, you should’ve seen them! They totally hate me. 10 hèn sǐ le 恨死了 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing10"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "恨死了") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Totally. 11 shī fù zěn me cái néng bǎ wǒ xùn liàn chéng shén lóng dà xiá ne 师父怎么才能把我训练成神龙大侠呢 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing11"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "师父怎么才能把我训练成神龙大侠呢") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } How is Shifu ever going to turn me into the Dragon Warrior? 12 wǒ bú shì nà wǔ gè 我不是那五个 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing12"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "我不是那五个") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I mean, I’m not like the Five. 13 wǒ méi yǒu lì zhǎo méi yǒu chì bǎng 我没有利爪 没有翅膀 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing13"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "我没有利爪 没有翅膀") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I’ve got no claws, no wings, no venom. 14 méi yǒu dú yè lián táng láng dōu yǒu nà yàng de dōng xī 没有毒液 连螳螂都有那样的东西 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing14"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "没有毒液 连螳螂都有那样的东西") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Even Mantis has those… thingies. 15 āi wǒ hái shì fàng qì ba huí jiā zuò wǒ de miàn tiáo 哎 我还是放弃吧 回家做我的面条 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing15"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "哎 我还是放弃吧 回家做我的面条") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Maybe I should just quit and go back to making noodles. 16 fàng qì ? bú fàng qì ? 放弃? 不放弃? var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing16"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "放弃? 不放弃?") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Quit, don’t quit. 17 zuò miàn tiáo ? bú zuò miàn tiáo ? 做面条? 不做面条? var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing17"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "做面条? 不做面条?") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Noodles, don’t noodles. 18 nǐ huàn dé huàn shī tài zài yì cóng qián yòu tài dān xīn jiāng lái 你患得患失 太在意从前 又太担心将来 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing18"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "你患得患失 太在意从前 又太担心将来") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } You are too concerned with what was and what will be. 19 yǒu jù huà shuō dé hǎo 有句话说得好 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing19"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "有句话说得好") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } There’s a saying: 20 zuó tiān shì duàn lì shǐ 昨天是段历史 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing20"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "昨天是段历史") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Yesterday is history, 21 míng tiān shì gè mí tuán 明天是个谜团 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing21"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "明天是个谜团") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } tomorrow is a mystery, 22 ér jīn tiān shì tiān cì de lǐ wù 而今天是天赐的礼物 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing22"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "而今天是天赐的礼物") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } but today is a gift. 23 xiàng zhēn xī lǐ wù nà yàng zhēn xī jīn tiān 像珍惜礼物那样珍惜今天 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing23"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "像珍惜礼物那样珍惜今天") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } That is why it is called the present. Shadowing Typing Type in the above input box. It will turn green if correct. Choose a Chinese input method you like. I’m using Sogou Pinyin ( Wiki , official link ). docs.text: Chinese Pinyin English 不 bù no 吃 chī eat 大 dà big 的 de 东西 dōng xi thing 都 dōu all 个 gè a, an 好 hǎo good 回 huí return 家 jiā home 今天 jīn tiān today 看 kàn look 来 lái come 了 le 里 lǐ inside 没 méi no 明天 míng tiān tomorrow 那 (那儿) nà (nà ér) there, that 呢 ne 能 néng can, be able to 你 nǐ you 上 shàng up 什么 shén me what, why 是 shì be (am, is, are) 他 tā he, him 太 tài too 他们 tā men they 我 wǒ I, me 五 wǔ five 些 xiē some 有 yǒu have 在 zài in, at 怎么 zěn me how 这 (这儿) zhè (zhè ér) here, this 做 zuò do 昨天 zuó tiān yesterday
docs.title: Pronouncing

docs.text: 1 kàn lái nǐ yǐ jīng fā xiàn le zhè kē tiān zhì shén míng shèng táo shù 看来你已经发现了这棵天智神明圣桃树 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing1"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "看来你已经发现了这棵天智神明圣桃树") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I see you have found the Sacred Peach Tree of Heavenly Wisdom. 2 jiù shì zhè kē shù ? bú hǎo yì sī wǒ hái yǐ wéi shì píng cháng de táo shù 就是这棵树? 不好意思 我还以为是平常的桃树 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing2"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "就是这棵树? 不好意思 我还以为是平常的桃树") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Is that what this is? Sorry. I thought it was just a regular peach tree. 3 zhè wǒ lǐ jiě nǐ xīn qíng fán zào suǒ yǐ nǐ jiù chī 这我理解 你心情烦躁 所以你就吃 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing3"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "这我理解 你心情烦躁 所以你就吃") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I understand. You eat when you are upset. 4 xīn fán ？wǒ méi xīn fán nǐ zěn me jiào dé wǒ xīn fán ？ 心烦？我没心烦 你怎么觉得我心烦？ var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing4"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "心烦？我没心烦 你怎么觉得我心烦？") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Upset? I’m not upset. What makes you think I’m upset. 5 nǐ dào dǐ xīn lǐ zài fán xiē shí me ？ 你到底心里在烦些什么？ var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing5"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "你到底心里在烦些什么？") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } So why are you so upset? 6 āi wǒ jīn tiān de biǎo xiàn yǒu kě néng shì lì shǐ shàng zuì làn gōng fū shǐ shàng zuì làn 哎 我今天的表现有可能是历史上最烂 功夫史上最烂 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing6"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "哎 我今天的表现有可能是历史上最烂 功夫史上最烂") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I probably sucked more today than anyone in the history of kung fu. 7 zuì làn shǐ shàng zuì làn 最烂史上最烂 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing7"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "最烂史上最烂") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } In the history of China. In the history of sucking! 8 yǒu kě néng 有可能 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing8"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "有可能") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Probably. 9 hái yǒu nà wǔ gè nǐ zhēn gāi kàn kàn tā men nà yàng tā men hèn sǐ wǒ le 还有那五个 你真该看看他们那样 他们恨死我了 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing9"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "还有那五个 你真该看看他们那样 他们恨死我了") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } And the Five! Man, you should’ve seen them! They totally hate me. 10 hèn sǐ le 恨死了 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing10"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "恨死了") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Totally. 11 shī fù zěn me cái néng bǎ wǒ xùn liàn chéng shén lóng dà xiá ne 师父怎么才能把我训练成神龙大侠呢 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing11"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "师父怎么才能把我训练成神龙大侠呢") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } How is Shifu ever going to turn me into the Dragon Warrior? 12 wǒ bú shì nà wǔ gè 我不是那五个 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing12"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "我不是那五个") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I mean, I’m not like the Five. 13 wǒ méi yǒu lì zhǎo méi yǒu chì bǎng 我没有利爪 没有翅膀 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing13"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "我没有利爪 没有翅膀") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } I’ve got no claws, no wings, no venom. 14 méi yǒu dú yè lián táng láng dōu yǒu nà yàng de dōng xī 没有毒液 连螳螂都有那样的东西 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing14"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "没有毒液 连螳螂都有那样的东西") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Even Mantis has those… thingies. 15 āi wǒ hái shì fàng qì ba huí jiā zuò wǒ de miàn tiáo 哎 我还是放弃吧 回家做我的面条 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing15"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "哎 我还是放弃吧 回家做我的面条") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Maybe I should just quit and go back to making noodles. 16 fàng qì ? bú fàng qì ? 放弃? 不放弃? var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing16"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "放弃? 不放弃?") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Quit, don’t quit. 17 zuò miàn tiáo ? bú zuò miàn tiáo ? 做面条? 不做面条? var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing17"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "做面条? 不做面条?") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Noodles, don’t noodles. 18 nǐ huàn dé huàn shī tài zài yì cóng qián yòu tài dān xīn jiāng lái 你患得患失 太在意从前 又太担心将来 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing18"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "你患得患失 太在意从前 又太担心将来") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } You are too concerned with what was and what will be. 19 yǒu jù huà shuō dé hǎo 有句话说得好 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing19"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "有句话说得好") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } There’s a saying: 20 zuó tiān shì duàn lì shǐ 昨天是段历史 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing20"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "昨天是段历史") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Yesterday is history, 21 míng tiān shì gè mí tuán 明天是个谜团 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing21"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "明天是个谜团") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } tomorrow is a mystery, 22 ér jīn tiān shì tiān cì de lǐ wù 而今天是天赐的礼物 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing22"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "而今天是天赐的礼物") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } but today is a gift. 23 xiàng zhēn xī lǐ wù nà yàng zhēn xī jīn tiān 像珍惜礼物那样珍惜今天 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing23"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "像珍惜礼物那样珍惜今天") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } That is why it is called the present.

docs.text: Light Chinese HSK 1 word list Author Roden Luo 罗登 Time 2020-06-12 21:08:02 Chinese Pinyin English 爱 ài love 八 bā eight 爸爸 bà ba father 北京 běi jīng Beijing 杯子 bēi zi cup 本 běn volume 不 bù no 不客气 bú kè qì you are welcome 菜 cài vegetable 茶 chá tea 吃 chī eat 出租车 chū zū chē taxi 大 dà big 打电话 dǎ diàn huà call up 的 de 点 diǎn dot, spot 电脑 diàn nǎo computer 电视 diàn shì television 电影 diàn yǐng movie 东西 dōng xi thing 都 dōu all 读 dú read 对不起 duì bù qǐ sorry 多 duō many, much 多少 duō shǎo how many, how much 二 èr two 儿子 ér zi son 饭店 fàn diàn restaurant 飞机 fēi jī airplane 分钟 fēn zhōng minute 高兴 gāo xìng happy 个 gè a, an 工作 gōng zuò work 狗 gǒu dog 汉语 hàn yǔ Chinese 好 hǎo good 和 hé and 喝 hē drink 很 hěn quite, very 后面 hòu miàn behind 回 huí return 会 huì can 火车站 huǒ chē zhàn train station 几 jǐ a few, how many 家 jiā home 叫 jiào call 今天 jīn tiān today 九 jiǔ nine 开 kāi open 看 kàn look 看见 kàn jiàn see 块 kuài piece 来 lái come 老师 lǎo shī teacher 了 le 冷 lěng cold 里 lǐ inside 零 líng zero 六 liù six 吗 ma 买 mǎi buy 妈妈 mā ma mother 猫 māo cat 没 méi no 没关系 méi guān xì It doesn’t matter 米饭 mǐ fàn rice 明天 míng tiān tomorrow 名字 míng zi name 那 (那儿) nà (nà ér) there, that 哪 （哪儿） nǎ (nǎ ér) where 呢 ne 能 néng can, be able to 你 nǐ you 年 nián year 你们 nǐ men you (pl.) 女儿 nǚ ér daughter 朋友 péng you friend 漂亮 piào liàng beautiful 苹果 píng guǒ apple 七 qī seven 钱 qián money 前面 qián miàn front 请 qǐng please 去 qù go 热 rè hot 人 rén person 认识 rèn shi know 日 rì day 三 sān three 上 shàng up 商店 shāng diàn store 上午 shàng wǔ morning 少 shǎo few, little 什么 shén me what, why 十 shí ten 是 shì be (am, is, are) 时候 shí hou time 书 shū book 谁 shuí who 水 shuǐ water 水果 shuǐ guǒ fruit 睡觉 shuì jiào sleep 说话 shuō huà speak 四 sì four 岁 suì year 他 tā he, him 她 tā she, her 太 tài too 他们 tā men they 她们 tā men they (females, pl.) 天气 tiān qì weather 听 tīng listen 同学 tóng xué classmate 喂 wèi hello 我 wǒ I, me 我们 wǒ men we, us 五 wǔ five 下 xià down 想 xiǎng want 先生 xiān sheng sir 现在 xiàn zài now 小 xiǎo small 小姐 xiǎo jiě Miss 下午 xià wǔ afternoon 下雨 xià yǔ rain 写 xiě write 些 xiē some 谢谢 xiè xie thank 喜欢 xǐ huān love, like 星期 xīng qī week 学生 xué shēng student 学习 xué xí study 学校 xué xiào school 一 yī one 衣服 yī fu cloth 医生 yī shēng doctor 医院 yī yuàn hospital 椅子 yǐ zi chair 有 yǒu have 月 yuè month 在 zài in, at 再见 zài jiàn good-bye 怎么 zěn me how 怎么样 zěn me yàng how about 这 (这儿) zhè (zhè ér) here, this 中国 zhōng guó China 中午 zhōng wǔ noon 住 zhù live 桌子 zhuō zi desk 字 zì character 做 zuò do 坐 zuò sit 昨天 zuó tiān yesterday References HSK 1: https://www.hsk.academy/en/hsk_1
docs.title: HSK 1 word list
